question.text: The feeding of cattle should be carried out in a scientific manner with special emphasis on

options.text: Both the quality and quantity of fodder.
Neither the quality nor the quantity of fodder.

solution.text:
In dairy farm management:

a. Processes and systems are involved that increase milk yield and improve quality.

b. Proper care is given to the cattle: well housed, well-fed (A. Clean water, B. Fodder with quality and quantity), and maintaining a disease-free environment.

c. Cleanliness and hygiene of the handler and animal are also maintained while milking storage and transport of the milk and its products.

d. Regular inspections and visits by a veterinary doctor are mandatory.
